title: JPM to bring more deals and happy CEOs
description: Why will pharma CEOs be greeted warmly in San Francisco next week? And who will buy Revolution Medicines? All that and more on this week's episode of "The Readout LOUD."
content: Why will pharma CEOs be greeted warmly in San Francisco next week? And who will buy Revolution Medicines? All that and more on this week's episode of "The Readout LOUD."
